attributes.action: Bent Police Officers with holding evidence of murder victims in Barnsley South Yorkshire
attributes.additional_details:
Government need to re open murder cases!

Will the Police open murder cases dating back to the early 1990s

How many Police Officers are being paid money to hide evidence of murder crimes?

How many Police Forces are working with murderers instead of seeing justice for the families of murder victims?

Why does money always talk and stop justice?
